attributes.additional_details:
An out of  prison punishment in public for those that have  committed crimes in the local community such as rioting, graffiti, criminal damage, theft etc.

They will be semi-humiliated in public as the work to fix, mend both the damage they have caused and areas of the community that need to be cleaned, repaired or re-built.

Wearing a jump suit akin to the orange suits they wear in American jails (maybe pink for added humiliation and deterrent) they will be identified by the community as criminals.
